title: Longest Saturday Morning Cartoon Ever: Animated Ghostbusters Film In the Works
text:
Longest Saturday Morning Cartoon Ever: Animated Ghostbusters Film In the Works 
Published By: Geekosystem - Today 
Sony is currently developing an animated film based on Ghostbusters. Ivan Reitman, director of the original film, is producing the project, ...
